img_above_text:
![Wukong Pagoda 73.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/45/Wukong_Pagoda_73.jpg)
Head up the path where you'll find one more Red-Haired Yaksha patrolling, and lure him away from the enemies at the end of the path to take him on alone.
img_below_text:
Past where the Yaksha was patrolling, you should find two cells. One is already open, and holds a green Wisp inside near a Frozen Corpse keep traveling down this cell tunnel past an Abomination, and you can find a **Treasure Chest** with some materials inside.
![Wukong Pagoda 75.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a0/Wukong_Pagoda_75.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Pagoda 73.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/45/Wukong_Pagoda_73.jpg)
Head up the path where you'll find one more Red-Haired Yaksha patrolling, and lure him away from the enemies at the end of the path to take him on alone."
        - Following Text: "Past where the Yaksha was patrolling, you should find two cells. One is already open, and holds a green Wisp inside near a Frozen Corpse keep traveling down this cell tunnel past an Abomination, and you can find a **Treasure Chest** with some materials inside.
![Wukong Pagoda 75.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a0/Wukong_Pagoda_75.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat encounter in *Black Myth: Wukong*, where the player character is engaged in a fight against an enemy near a treasure chest in a dimly lit, rocky environment. Sparks and visual effects suggest an active attack or ability being used. The preceding and following text indicate this scene occurs after luring away a Red-Haired Yaksha and before exploring cells and finding a treasure chest containing materials.
